website_summaries.verdict: Whether you collect Lenox pieces or are simply looking for a gorgeous stoneware vase, this elegant vessel won't disappoint. The decent price point is appealing too.
pros: Crafted by Lenox, a brand renowned for making outstanding home decor items for generations
8-inch height fits nicely on tables, shelves, and mantels
Features a classic fluted design with smooth glazed finish
cons: May not work if you need a taller vase for long-stemmed flowers, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! I wanted a small vase to keep at my work desk for flowers and this fit the bill! The color is beautiful. It's a very light and airy blue and it complements my pink flowers well. The design on the vase makes it stand out and unique. This is a very high quality product. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mint Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Pretty. I really like the Frame Outline. Thank you for fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINE A MCKENNA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Color is so pretty. Looks more expensive than it was. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Big rick

customer_reviews.title: A very beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friends birthday. Because she loves Lenox vases. She absolutely loved it. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce G

customer_reviews.title: it is very pretty & heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: it is very pretty & heavy duty. Go it for our 30th wedding anniversary photo taken in the Bahamas. Looks beautiful in this frame. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, elegant, but I feel it a little expensive in person
customer_reviews.author: Hesheng Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, design and size. Not too big, or small for a handful of flower's.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Me A Lenox China Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Have been a fan of Lenox since my father would by mom the holly Christmas china each year. I got this frame to add to my collection and it is beautiful. The stand hold the ceramic frames weight nicely. Has three clips on the pack (clear plastic) that keep photo in place.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frame!!
customer_reviews.text: Lenox produces the most gorgeous picture frames, and this frame is no exception! Beautiful to look at, but also very sturdy! Love it, and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars and the moon if I could, 😊. The color is so pretty. It took a lot of searching to find this on Amazon . Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: N. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the rest of my set.
customer_reviews.text: In love with this vase.Nice ice blue color which to me looks more of soft mint green. It made in China. 8 inches tall. Etched raised art work. Comes in Lenox box Pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

product_meta.title: Lenox French Perle Ice Blue 8" Fluted Vase - 869509
product_meta.description: Style Name:Vase, FlutedAt Lenox, we strive to make the daily moments in your life a bit more special. Inspired by heritage and designed for now, we bring a rich history of craftsmanship to modern day life. We’ve been a part of homes for over 130 years. Each time you buy Lenox, you are buying a versatile and timeless piece crafted with our century-long commitment to quality, artistry and beauty. Whether you’re gathering the family for dinner, grabbing a midnight snack for yourself in front of the TV or having friends over, Lenox is for real moments that last on products that are meant for living. The French Perle Ice Blue 8" Fluted Vase is ideal for displaying a single trimmed flower. Standing at a handsome 8" in height, this powder blue ceramic vase is assertive yet unimposing. The ideal balance for any household fixture.
